login.title: Customer Service Bot
login.subtitle: Access your control panel
login.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
login.resetPasswordSubtitle: Enter the email address associated with your account and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
login.resetPasswordError: Failed to send reset link. Please check the email and try again.
login.resetPasswordSuccess: Password reset link sent! Please check your email.

leads.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this lead?
leads.deleteAllConfirm: This will delete ALL {{count}} leads permanently. This action cannot be undone. Please type "DELETE" to confirm.
leads.noLeads: No leads have been collected yet.

superadmin.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the workspace "{{name}}"? This action is irreversible.

agents.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} from this workspace? This will delete their account.

history.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this chat history forever?
history.deleteAllConfirm: This will delete ALL {{count}} chat histories for this workspace permanently. This action cannot be undone. Please type "DELETE" to confirm.

feedback.deletedAllSuccess: All chat histories have been deleted.

chatPanel.noActiveChats: No active chats yet. Take one from requests above!

chatbotUI.headerTitle: How can I help you today?
chatbotUI.agentInstruction: If you want to talk to a human please type:
chatbotUI.agentKeyword: I want to talk to an agent
chatbotUI.inputPlaceholderPending: Waiting for an agent to take over...
chatbotUI.handoffMessage: Understood. I'm finding an agent to help you. Please wait.
chatbotUI.leadFormSubtitle: Please provide your contact details so we can assist you better.
chatbotUI.formError: There was an issue. Please try again.
chatbotUI.technicalError: I'm sorry, I'm having some technical difficulties. Please try again later.
chatbotUI.disclaimer: I am an AI and may make mistakes. Please consider verifying important information.

settings.pageSubtitle: Customize your chatbot and manage integrations

feedback.avatarUpdated: Avatar updated! Click 'Save Settings' to make the change permanent.

customization.title: Bot Customization
customization.subtitle: Personalize your chatbot's appearance and behavior

botName.label: Chatbot Name
botName.description: This name will appear in the chat header

primaryColor.label: Primary Color
primaryColor.description: Used for headers and user messages

installation.title: Installation
installation.subtitle: Add your chatbot to your website
installation.embedDescription: Copy and paste this code snippet just before the closing </body> tag on your website.
installation.wpDescription: For WordPress websites, follow these steps:
installation.wpStep4: 4. Paste the code just before the closing body tag
installation.wpAlternative: Alternative: Use a plugin like "Insert Headers and Footers" to add the code without editing theme files.
installation.customStep2: 2. For React/Vue: Edit your main layout component
installation.customStep3: 3. Paste the code before the closing body tag
installation.customNote: Note: The chatbot will automatically appear on all pages where the script is included.

knowledge.title: Knowledge Base
knowledge.subtitle: Upload documents to train your chatbot
knowledge.description: Upload PDF, TXT, or DOCX files containing your company's information, FAQs, policies, or any other relevant content.
knowledge.uploadLabel: Upload a file or drag and drop

comingSoon.title: Website Training
comingSoon.subtitle: Automatically train your bot from website content
comingSoon.description: Enter your website URL to automatically crawl and extract content for your chatbot's knowledge base.

botAvatar.label: Bot Avatar URL
botAvatar.description: Provide a direct URL to an image for the bot's avatar. Leave empty to use the default.

botIntro.label: Bot Introduction
botIntro.description: A short, friendly introduction that appears under the bot's name.

feedback.avatarUpdated: Avatar updated! Click 'Save' to apply the changes.

whatsapp.welcome: Hello! Welcome. To begin, what is your full name?
whatsapp.welcomeBack: Welcome back, {{name}}! How can I help you today?
whatsapp.askEmail: Thank you! Now, please tell me your email address.
whatsapp.chatReady: Perfect, thank you! You can now start chatting. How can I help you today?

leadClassification.title: Lead Classification
leadClassification.description: Automatically analyze conversations to identify hot, warm and cold leads
